nhc_headline: ...SARA NOW MOVING WESTWARD INTO THE GULF OF HONDURAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING CATASTROPHIC FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES  CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...SARA NOW MOVING WESTWARD INTO THE GULF OF HONDURAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING CATASTROPHIC FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES  CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 12:00 PM CST Sat Nov 16
 the center of Sara was located near 16.3, -86.8
 with movement W at 4 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
